title: Phase 3: Migrate Flutter Frontend (Models, Providers, Widgets)
description: Consolidate duplicate providers/widgets, update all Dart code to use 'cultivar' terminology, align models with backend schema
acceptance_criteria: Only ONE cultivar provider exists (no duplicates)
Only ONE cultivar card widget exists (no duplicates)
All Flutter imports use cultivar terminology
All Dart models aligned with backend Pydantic schemas
No strain references in Dart code (except comments)
notes: Phase 3 - Frontend consolidation and terminology update
